argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frlmval.f | |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elex | |- ( R e. V -> R e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elex | |- ( I e. W -> I e. _V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_id | |- ( r = R -> r = R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( ringLMod ` r ) = ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_sneqd | |- ( r = R -> { ( ringLMod ` r ) } = { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_xpeq2d | |- ( r = R -> ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` r ) } ) = ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( r (+)m ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` r ) } ) ) = ( R (+)m ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_xpeq1 | |- ( i = I -> ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) = ( I X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( i = I -> ( R (+)m ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) = ( R (+)m ( I X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-frlm | |- freeLMod = ( r e. _V , i e. _V |-> ( r (+)m ( i X. { ( ringLMod ` r ) } ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( R (+)m ( I X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) e. _V |
| 13 | 8, 10, 11, 12 | #P_ovmpt2 | |- ( ( R e. _V /\ I e. _V ) -> ( R freeLMod I ) = ( R (+)m ( I X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 3, 13 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> ( R freeLMod I ) = ( R (+)m ( I X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> F = ( R (+)m ( I X. { ( ringLMod ` R ) } ) ) ) |
